Dia Design Guild

This project is maintained by DIADesignGuild

Contribute to the Guild

Participate in Discord discussions

The Discord server is where the community connects with each other and supports one another.

Discord channels are organized in broad categories:

  • Discussion
  • Game Studio

Discussion

Channel Name Description
#introductions Self-introductions
#open-discussion General conversation about UX
#conference-events Share informations about upcoming conferences and events relevant to UX and relevant fields and practices.
#jobsearch-opps Post job and internship opportunities. Be sure to call out any particular requirements
#ask-for-help Open channel for people to ask questions, feedback
#off-topic Â 
#resources Share learning resources or helpful articles
#suggestions Post suggestions for improving the Guild and/or the community.

Channel Categories

CategoryDescriptionAccess
DiscussionOpen channels grouped by broad categories
UX Book Club
Game StudioModerated by Justin Kim.
ProjectsChannels for project based text channels
Apprentice ProgramOpen channel for all apprentices and private channels for each apprentice
AdminChannels for managing the Guild's daily operations
